display_long_description:
Off-Road Racing brings intense, fast-paced action to the Meta Quest like never before. Strap into your rugged off-road vehicle and take on thrilling races across challenging tracks filled with dirt, dust, and danger. Compete against smart AI opponents who will push your driving skills to the limit.

Feel every bump, slide, and jump through fully immersive VR gameplay. With realistic vehicle handling, dynamic environments, and responsive motion controls, Off-Road Racing delivers a pulse-pounding experience that puts you behind the wheel like never before.

Choose your route wisely, drift through tight corners, and boost past your rivals to take first place. Each race offers unique landscapes and obstacles—from rocky canyons to muddy trails—making every lap a test of skill and reflexes.

Are you ready to take on the dirt and claim your spot as the ultimate off-road racer? Put on your headset, grip the wheel, and hit the gas. It’s time to conquer the wild in Off-Road Racing—only on Meta Quest.
